summary: Officers Kyung-yoon CHO and Eun-joo PARK are on the hunt a killer following duo of ghastly murders. The victims carry a common military past, and the secret of their past must be unraveled to find the killer.
cast: Kang-woo Kim|Gyu-ri Kim|Su-kyeong Lee|Duk-moon Choi|Yoo-i Ha|Chang-geol Jeon|Bit Kang|Ji-won Kang|Yi-seok Kang|Sung-ryung Kim|Won-bae Kim|Yoo-Jeong Kim|Pung-wun Lee|Soo-kyung Lee|Ji-Yeong Oh|Sang-cheol Park|Lee Poong-Yoon|Park Won-Sang
title: Ga-myeon
